direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle internal transfers for futures accounts with similar parameter checks and request handling.
Both methods access transfer history but for different types of accounts (futures vs. spot).
Both methods involve transferring assets between accounts with similar parameter checks and request handling.
Both methods depend on the transfer of assets between accounts, though for different purposes (futures vs. general sub-account transfers).
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to account access and parameter validation.
